page.title: 12Traffic Danger
page.content: There is only one {SOCIAL CONCERN } that we could find from the people of the area and that was in the village of Eaton Constantine. Here people are very worried about the traffic that goes through the village. The main road through the village is an easy route for people travelling from Cressage to Telford. This road is not busy by town standards but is used regularly by people travelling to and from work in the morning and evening. The road is narrow and has no footpath. There is no speed limit and the local people have told the Parish Council and the County Council that they think the situation is dangerous. There are no other concerns that people we talked to could think of.
